Body:
""" Calculate Anscombe Parameters """
y_noisy, dark, g_mean, g_std, p_alpha = make_datasets
out = calc_anscombe_parameters(dark, y_noisy, axis=0, rng=None,
    dark_subtracted=False)
assert np.allclose(out['g_mean'].mean(), g_mean, rtol=0.01)
assert np.allclose(out['g_std'].mean(), g_std, rtol=0.01)
assert np.allclose(out['weighted_mean_alpha'].mean(), p_alpha, rtol=0.01)
